title: hoaryal1
author: hoaryal1
content: Hello everyone, in the last year I gather and bookmarked interesting good crypto guides and resources, and thought it would be good to share them with you all. TGuide: You now have several million in crypto. How do you cash out?Crypto.com Lays Off More than 2,000 Employees A record 55,000 Bitcoin, or over $1.1 billion, was just withdrawn from Binance The Complete Security Guide to keep you, your computer, and your crypto safeOCEl Salvador President: If Our BTC Experiment Succeeds, Many Countries Will FollowBlockchain And Cryptocurrency: A Comprehensive GuideBlockchain Marketing – Everything You Need to KnowKattana: Pro Trading Candlestick GuideI hope you find it useful, feel free to comment and add stuff you found helpful/interesting and I will edit and add them

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: hoaryal1 on November 03, 2022, 12:18:41 PM-snip-Crypto.com Lays Off More than 2,000 EmployeesA record 55,000 Bitcoin, or over $1.1 billion, was just withdrawn from Binance El Salvador President: If Our BTC Experiment Succeeds, Many Countries Will FollowI don't understand the importance of bookmarking this kind of news, which will eventually become obsolete. I would advise you to bookmark the guidances or warning pages related to your crypto activities.Some important bitcointalk [GUIDE] for beginners.Collection of comprehensive guides on identify and avoid scam projectsKingsDen's Newbie Guide Compilation.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: noorman0 on November 03, 2022, 01:22:32 PMI don't understand the importance of bookmarking this kind of news, which will eventually become obsolete. I would advise you to bookmark the guidances or warning pages related to your crypto activities.This lol. Half of the links aren't even "guides" or something I would call a "resource".Checking OP's post history, seems like he's just looking for a way to include the GuerrillaBuzz URL into the main post.
